newsitem.title: PHILIPPINES: Manila Central Bank cuts rate on one-year T-bill.
newsitem.headline: Manila Central Bank cuts rate on one-year T-bill.

text.p: The Philippine Central Bank on Tuesday trimmed its borrowing rate on the one-year special series Treasury bill rates to 10.40 from 10.70 percent.
Traders said the adjustment in rates was in line with the slide in Treasury bill rates in Monday's auction.
A dearth of investment instruments and low inflation have led to a softening in interest rates, they said.
The Central Bank, however, left its overnight borrowing and lending rates at 10.0 and 12.75 percent respectively.
